00001 module cmfd_data
00002 
00003   implicit none
00004   private
00005   public :: set_up_cmfd
00006 
00007 contains
00008 
00009 !==============================================================================
00010 ! SET_UP_CMFD
00011 !===============================================================================
00012 
00013   subroutine set_up_cmfd()
00014 
00015     use cmfd_input
00016 
00017     ! read the input file
00018     call read_input()
00019 
00020     ! compute dtilde terms
00021     call compute_dtilde()
00022 
00023   end subroutine set_up_cmfd
00024 
00025 !===============================================================================
00026 ! COMPUTE_DTILDE computes the diffusion coupling coefficient
00027 !===============================================================================
00028 
00029   subroutine compute_dtilde()
00030 
00031     use global, only: cmfd
00032 
00033     ! local variables
00034     integer :: nx                 ! maximum number of cells in x direction
00035     integer :: ny                 ! maximum number of cells in y direction
00036     integer :: nz                 ! maximum number of cells in z direction
00037     integer :: ng                 ! maximum number of energy groups
00038     integer :: nxyz(3,2)          ! single vector containing boundary locations
00039     integer :: i                  ! iteration counter for x
00040     integer :: j                  ! iteration counter for y
00041     integer :: k                  ! iteration counter for z
00042     integer :: g                  ! iteration counter for groups
00043     integer :: l                  ! iteration counter for leakages
00044     integer :: xyz_idx            ! index for determining if x,y or z leakage
00045     integer :: dir_idx            ! index for determining - or + face of cell
00046     integer :: shift_idx          ! parameter to shift index by +1 or -1
00047     integer :: neig_idx(3)        ! spatial indices of neighbour
00048     integer :: bound(6)           ! vector containing indices for boudary check
00049     real(8) :: albedo(6)          ! albedo vector with global boundaries
00050     real(8) :: cell_totxs         ! total cross section of current ijk cell
00051     real(8) :: cell_dc            ! diffusion coef of current cell
00052     real(8) :: cell_hxyz(3)       ! cell dimensions of current ijk cell
00053     real(8) :: neig_totxs         ! total xs of neighbor cell
00054     real(8) :: neig_dc            ! diffusion coefficient of neighbor cell
00055     real(8) :: neig_hxyz(3)       ! cell dimensions of neighbor cell
00056     real(8) :: dtilde             ! finite difference coupling parameter 
00057     real(8) :: ref_albedo         ! albedo to reflector
00058 
00059     ! get maximum of spatial and group indices
00060     nx = cmfd%indices(1)
00061     ny = cmfd%indices(2)
00062     nz = cmfd%indices(3)
00063     ng = cmfd%indices(4)
00064 
00065     ! create single vector of these indices for boundary calculation
00066     nxyz(1,:) = (/1,nx/)
00067     nxyz(2,:) = (/1,ny/)
00068     nxyz(3,:) = (/1,nz/)
00069 
00070     ! get boundary condition information
00071     albedo = cmfd%albedo
00072 
00073     ! geting loop over group and spatial indices
00074     ZLOOP:  do k = 1,nz
00075 
00076       YLOOP: do j = 1,ny
00077 
00078         XLOOP: do i = 1,nx
00079 
00080           GROUP: do g = 1,ng
00081 
00082             ! get cell data
00083             cell_dc = cmfd%diffcof(g,i,j,k)
00084             cell_hxyz = cmfd%hxyz(:,i,j,k)
00085 
00086             ! setup of vector to identify boundary conditions
00087             bound = (/i,i,j,j,k,k/)
00088 
00089             ! begin loop around sides of cell for leakage
00090             LEAK: do l = 1,6
00091 
00092               ! define xyz and +/- indices
00093               xyz_idx = int(ceiling(real(l)/real(2)))  ! x=1, y=2, z=3
00094               dir_idx = 2 - mod(l,2) ! -=1, +=2
00095               shift_idx = -2*mod(l,2) +1          ! shift neig by -1 or +1
00096 
00097               ! check if at a boundary
00098               if (bound(l) == nxyz(xyz_idx,dir_idx)) then
00099 
00100                 ! compute dtilde
00101                 dtilde = (2*cell_dc*(1-albedo(l)))/(4*cell_dc*(1+albedo(l)) +  &
00102                &         (1-albedo(l))*cell_hxyz(xyz_idx))
00103 
00104               else  ! not a boundary
00105 
00106                 ! compute neighboring cell indices
00107                 neig_idx = (/i,j,k/)                ! begin with i,j,k
00108                 neig_idx(xyz_idx) = shift_idx + neig_idx(xyz_idx)
00109 
00110                 ! get neigbor cell data
00111                 neig_dc = cmfd%diffcof(g,neig_idx(1),neig_idx(2),neig_idx(3))
00112                 neig_hxyz = cmfd%hxyz(:,neig_idx(1),neig_idx(2),neig_idx(3))
00113 
00114                 ! compute dtilde
00115                 dtilde = (2*cell_dc*neig_dc)/(neig_hxyz(xyz_idx)*cell_dc +     &
00116                &         cell_hxyz(xyz_idx)*neig_dc)
00117 
00118               end if
00119 
00120               ! record dtilde in cmfd object
00121               cmfd%dtilde(l,g,i,j,k) = dtilde
00122 
00123             end do LEAK
00124 
00125           end do GROUP
00126 
00127         end do XLOOP
00128 
00129       end do YLOOP
00130 
00131     end do ZLOOP
00132 
00133   end subroutine compute_dtilde
00134 
00135 end module cmfd_data
